特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
Focus on content, tasks, group work, presentations, 4-skills.
(Information for students permitted to take classes online)
Classes will be broadcast through PowerPoint presentations with audio. Materials will be shared through the class Luna page.

トピック.授業外学習2: Students will be expected to complete all the assigned tasks before each class, because they will not be able to participate fully in class if they do not finish their homework.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: 40% Attendance & Participation, 30% Tasks, 20% English Central, 10% Vocabulary tests
